title: Men's 500 m - Speed Skating Cortina d'Ampezzo 1956 Winter Olympics
table: {"0":{"0":null,"1":"Men's 500 m 1956","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":null,"6":null,"7":null,"8":"4.","9":"5.","10":"6.","11":"7.","12":"-","13":"9.","14":"-","15":"11.","16":"-","17":"13.","18":"-","19":"15.","20":"16.","21":"17.","22":"-","23":"-","24":"-","25":"21.","26":"22.","27":"-","28":"-","29":"25.","30":"-","31":"-","32":"28.","33":"-","34":"30.","35":"-","36":"32.","37":"33.","38":"34.","39":"-","40":"36.","41":"37.","42":"-","43":"-","44":"40.","45":"41.","46":"42.","47":"43.","48":"44.","49":"45.","50":null,"51":null,"52":null,"53":null,"54":"Men's 500 m - Speed Skating - Cortina d'Ampezzo 1956 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes). Skaters had to change lanes in the back straightaway of each lap in order to skate an equal distance. The skater on the outer lane had the right of way and the skater leaving the inner lane should avoid collision. The Olympic gold medal winner was the athlete with the fastest time for the race.
